article_node.title: €5,990 Smart EV Redefines Joyful Mobility
article_node.summary: Chinese innovation brand ASTRAUX will launch its Global Launch Event on September 4, 2025 in Berlin, unveiling a micro electric vehicle (ASTRAUX Micro Smart EV AL series) that can be driven by teens in some EU countries, an AI-powered companion robot Aimon, and AI sunglasses. The vehicle features a distinctive design with oversized headlights, panoramic sunroof, 360° view, in‑car karaoke, ambient lighting, and an external drone, aiming to combine style, technology, and affordability under the “Joy for All” philosophy. Early‑bird pricing starts at €5,990 for the AL6 and €7,990 for the AL7, with a limited‑time €9.9 pre‑order offer available until September 6, 2025, and full refunds until November 10, 2025.
